message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product for $150. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm hoping we can come to an agreement closer to my budget. Would you consider $120 for the product?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $135?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, would you be open to $125 for the product?
